attributes.action: Pay the ransom to free The Chandlers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government can happily sort out banks in trouble by paying billions of pounds, but what about where real lives are concerned?

The Chandlers, from Tunbridge Wells, Kent, were seized in the early hours of October 23 when armed Somali pirates boarded their yacht, the Lynn Rival.

They were heading from the Seychelles towards Tanzania.

The couple were forced to change course to Somalia before being put on a container ship, the Kota Wajar, which had also been taken by the pirates.

They are since thought to have been brought ashore.

Their captors are demanding $7 million. For the sake of saving 2 lives, the government should just pay!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
